```{r setup}
library(CanCovidData)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
case_data <- get_cansim_case_data()

ggplot(case_data,aes(x=`Age group`,fill=Sex)) +
  geom_bar() +
  labs(title="Cases with age or sex information",
       y="Number of cases",
       caption="Data: StatCan table 13-10-0766") +
  coord_flip()
```
